mapper.select: SELECT SCH_NO, TITLE, BEGIN, END, BEGIN AS BEGIN_DATE, END AS END_DATE, DELETED, MEMBER_NO, COLOR FROM TB_INDIVIDUAL WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND DELETED = 'N'

SELECT SCH_NO, TITLE, BEGIN, END, LOCATION, NOTE, COLOR FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, SCH_NO, TITLE, BEGIN, END, LOCATION, NOTE, COLOR FROM TB_INDIVIDUAL WHERE DELETED = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{no} AND ((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MON') = TO_CHAR(BEGIN, 'MON')) OR (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MON') = TO_CHAR(END, 'MON'))) AND END > SYSDATE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
